did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Division of Nutritional Sciences Cooperative Extension Nutrition Program Records , 1940-2005.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell Cooperative Extension.Division of Nutritional Sciences.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Publications and other printed material from the Division, including DNS ALERT. Nutrition curriculum and policy material concerning Extension in the Department of Food and Nutrition in the NYS College of Home Economics in the 1950's and 1960's and later in the Department of Human Nutrition and Food in the College of Human Ecology, 1969-1974. Also 4-H projects, newsletters, Expanded Food and Nutrition Education Program (EFNEP) material and various other programs within the Division of Nutritional Sciences which was formed in 1974. Includes photographs.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Publications and other printed material from the Division, including DNS ALERT.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Expanded Food and Nutrition Education Program (U.S.)

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Division of Nutritional Sciences Records, #29-4-2733. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

Nutrition curriculum and policy material concerning Extension in the Department of Food and Nutrition in the NYS College of Home Economics in the 1950's and 1960's and later in the Department of Human Nutrition and Food in the College of Human Ecology, 1969-1974. Also 4-H projects, newsletters, Expanded Food and Nutrition Education Program (EFNEP) material and various other programs within the Division of Nutritional Sciences which was formed in 1974. Includes photographs.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIAL
relatedmaterial.p: See also collections #21-24-3292, Expanded Food and Nutrition Education Program Records; #21-24-1975, Cornell University Cooperative Extension Records; and #29-1-3247, Division of Nutritional Sciences Records for related material.
